section.p:
Student profiles can be filed to the school archive by any of the following methods:
Select a student profile, then select Student Delete from the main menu.
Press Delete student button on the toolbar.
Select corresponding item from the student context menu in either tree or table view (_fixme_ [xref]).
Use the Alt + D keyboard shortcut;
Select a student in the tree view panel and press Delete key (you will be prompted for confirmation).
A student profile editing window ( ) will appear on your screen. Press Delete button or the Enter key to confirm moving to the archive. Press Cancel or Esc to cancel the operation.
